53 struct BufferUniform {
54  BufferUniform();
55  BufferUniform(const ShaderInputInfo& info);
56 
57  Uniform m_uniform;
58  size_t m_offset; // The offset of the uniform in the buffer
59  size_t m_alignmentByteSize; // The alignment size (padded) of the uniform in the buffer
60  ShaderInputInfo m_info; // Info relating to the uniform itself
61 
62 private:
63  void initialize(const ShaderInputInfo& info);
64 };

136  inline bool isBound() const {
137  if (!s_boundUBO) return false;
138  return m_uuid == s_boundUBO->getUuid();
139  }

148  bool hasUniform(const GStringView& uniformName) const {
149  return Map::HasKey(m_data.m_uniforms, uniformName);
150  }

153  const Uniform& getUniformValue(const GStringView& uniformName) const;

156  Uniform getUniformBufferValue(const GString& uniformName);
157 
158  template<class VariantType>
159  inline void setUniformValue(const GStringView& uniformName, const VariantType& value) {
160  BufferUniform& bufferUniform = m_data.m_uniforms[uniformName];
161  // This check was causing problems, so it is no bueno.
162  //if (bufferUniform.m_uniform.get<VariantType>() != value) {
163  bufferUniform.m_uniform = Uniform(uniformName, value);
164  refreshUniform(bufferUniform);
165  //}
166  }
167  void setUniformValue(const Uniform& uniform);
168 
170  template<class T>
171  void setUniformSubValue(const GStringView& uniformName, size_t index, const T& value) {
172  BufferUniform& bufferUniform = m_data.m_uniforms[uniformName];
173  //QString typeName(bufferUniform.m_uniform.typeInfo().name());
174  if (!bufferUniform.m_uniform.is<std::vector<T>>()) {
175  Logger::Throw("Error, uniform is not a vector type");
176  }
177  std::vector<T>& uniformVal = bufferUniform.m_uniform.get<std::vector<T>>();
178  uniformVal[index] = value;
179  // TODO: Replace this with a less obliterative call
180  refreshUniform(bufferUniform);
181  }
